title: Who is in the band 'Rage Against The Machine'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tim Commerford – bass, backing vocals (1991-2000, 2007-2011, 2019-present) Zack de la Rocha – vocals (1991-2000, 2007-2011, 2019-present) Tom Morello – guitars (1991-2000, 2007-2011, 2019-present) Brad Wilk – drums, percussion (1991-2000, 2007-2011, 2019-present)
